Applicant : Ferrell, Astrid
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : My interests outside of teaching or the school environment are : Hunting, fishing, camping, fitness, reading, health. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an intermidiate educator teaching 5th grade ELA in a modified middle school , the facilitator of our Digital News Club and chair of our family and community engagement I feel that being a part of this program could benefit me in many ways,  As an educator increasing my own knowledge of STEM careers could help me inspire students , learning about different technologies could benefit the different committees and clubs at our school to increase student, famiy and community engagement. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

EXPERIENCE

	* No specific STEM domain experience

LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an intermidiate educator teaching 5th grade ELA in a modified middle school , the facilitator of our Digital News Club and chair of our family and community engagement I feel that being a part of this program could benefit me in many ways,  As an educator increasing my own knowledge of STEM careers could help me inspire students , learning about different technologies could benefit the different committees and clubs at our school to increase student, famiy and community engagement. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an intermidiate educator teaching 5th grade ELA in a modified middle school , the facilitator of our Digital News Club and chair of our family and community engagement I feel that being a part of this program could benefit me in many ways,  As an educator increasing my own knowledge of STEM careers could help me inspire students , learning about different technologies could benefit the different committees and clubs at our school to increase student, famiy and community engagement. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 2
	* 5



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
My interests outside of teaching or the school environment are : Hunting, fishing, camping, fitness, reading, health. 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Meridian
Open to:
	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : astridferrell@hotmail.com
	* Secondary Email : aferrell@caldwellschools.org
	* Phone : 2086089920
	* Communication & Availability : Anytime for emails, After 4 for phone calls and anytime for text
Applicant : Ferrell, Astrid
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile :

	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:

	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : astridferrell@hotmail.com
	* Secondary Email : aferrell@caldwellschools.org
	* Phone : 2086089920
	* Communication & Availability : Anytime for emails, After 4 for phone calls and anytime for text
Applicant : Ferrell, Astrid
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an intermidiate educator teaching 5th grade ELA in a modified middle school , the facilitator of our Digital News Club and chair of our family and community engagement I feel that being a part of this program could benefit me in many ways,  As an educator increasing my own knowledge of STEM careers could help me inspire students , learning about different technologies could benefit the different committees and clubs at our school to increase student, famiy and community engagement. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 2
	* 5



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
My interests outside of teaching or the school environment are : Hunting, fishing, camping, fitness, reading, health.

	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
My interests outside of teaching or the school environment are : Hunting, fishing, camping, fitness, reading, health. 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Meridian

	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	*

	* Primary Email : astridferrell@hotmail.com
	* Secondary Email : aferrell@caldwellschools.org
	* Phone : 2086089920
	* Communication & Availability : Anytime for emails, After 4 for phone calls and anytime for text
Applicant : Ferrell, Astrid
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an intermidiate educator teaching 5th grade ELA in a modified middle school , the facilitator of our Digital News Club and chair of our family and community engagement I feel that being a part of this program could benefit me in many ways,  As an educator increasing my own knowledge of STEM careers could help me inspire students , learning about different technologies could benefit the different committees and clubs at our school to increase student, famiy and community engagement. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)

EXPERIENCE
